website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for beautiful curtains that do an amazing job keeping out noise and light, you won't find a better choice for your money.
pros: Stands at the top of the pack in almost every way – attractive, impressive room-darkening performance, and quality material
Comes in a variety of colors
Grommets look nice and make hanging them easy
cons: A few owners say the noise-dampening effects weren't as strong as they had hoped

customer_reviews.title: The curtains were very thick and blocked light adequately but ...
customer_reviews.text: The curtains were very thick and blocked light adequately but showed up with dark stains on them (pictured). I returned them right away and will be ordering others.
customer_reviews.author: m.long

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I don't mind the look, feel, or color, however, the two panels were different lengths. So extremely frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof4

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I needed white curtains but was hesitant about buying these because I had read previous reviews stating that the white curtains looked grey, But they do not look grey.. Sure they aren't bright white but still a good color white. (See photo) I highly recommend them! They keep my room very dark during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Josie Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These curtains work wonderfully at blocking the light, and the material feels like it's a very high quality. We initially ordered light beige blackout curtains from Deconovo, but the quality was not great and they weren't the best at blocking out the light (probably a combination of the light color and the quality of the materials). These navy blue curtains are definitely perfect for what we needed and I'm grateful that they don't look or feel like motel/hospital decor
customer_reviews.author: T burn

customer_reviews.title: Real Blackout!
customer_reviews.text: These are real blackout! I ordered in white. Yes the backside is black but I have white wooden blinds on the window so no heat gain and still looks white from road. I tried the blackout from Nicetown and they were darkening only. I wish they were offered in a textured or pattern but thrilled to have real blackout in toddler bedroom. It’s great to not be awakened the second the sun is a hair over the horizon.
customer_reviews.author: Snowyk

customer_reviews.title: I finally found the perfect white curtains for my living room
customer_reviews.text: I finally found the perfect white curtains for my living room. I have shopped around for over a year now trying to find black out curtains. Not one pair I stumbled up on were truly black out. These on the other hand are amazing. As you can see in my pictures I took one with the lights off in early afternoon and the second picture is with my living room light on. I bought 2 pairs and seems like I would only be needing one. Great product definetely recomend it to anyone looking for all white black out curtains.
customer_reviews.author: RODDY RICHANI

customer_reviews.title: These are winners
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a second pair of blackout curtains after buying a different pair last year for our south facing window. I'm so glad I did because these blow the other ones out of the water. How much of a difference do you ask? Well, my baby usually sleeps until 6am – that's when the light starts peeking in, even with the other blackout blinds. It might have been a fluke, but one night with these, baby slept until 7:30am. Any parent knows that that right there is priceless. More sleep + baby = WORTH WAY MORE THAN $50.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking & They Block Heat and Light!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before I bought these curtains and rods. Actually, I bought one set, first and put them up in our jacuzzi room. The window on one side of the room gets full afternoon sunlight and in 90+ degree weather, it heats up the room so the inside temperature matches and sometimes exceeds the outside temperature. And our neighbors have fairly bright lights that stay on all night long. The first curtain worked so well that I ordered another. They block heat and light. A great combination and these curtains are relatively inexpensive. We should have bought these years ago!
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Muccigrosso

customer_reviews.title: This is great for blocking out the light
customer_reviews.text: This is great for blocking out the light, but the heat it has not blocked. I have west facing sliding glass door and in the afternoons you can feel the heat standing away from the curtains. For the light it has done its job very well. Very well made curtains. Would have been happier if it blocked the heat as described.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Schlutter

customer_reviews.title: Good light blocking curtains
customer_reviews.text: These are nice solid grey curtains with good light blocking
customer_reviews.author: S. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and NO quality control at the company!
customer_reviews.text: I just had an opportunity to hang these curtains. They have several stains on them. I am going try and return these asap!
customer_reviews.author: Big  Al

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking - wish I could return
customer_reviews.text: While the drapes are completely black-out like I wanted, the material is very cheap looking. Not at all what I expected. Forget trying to get the wrinkles out. I also feel like the black backing used to make them black out, pulled the heat into my room. It was definitely hotter than the new, nice curtains I bought that have a thick white backing for keeping the sun out. Very disappointed that I bought these in a hurry and must not be a Prime product, because there is no option to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Firlotte

customer_reviews.title: Bright white not totally blackout
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t find many reviews specifically about the black out quality of the bright white color (white with grey second layer instead of black), but I figured I’d give it a chance. Unfortunately, they are not completely black out, but do provide some coverage. Wanted others to be able to see and make an informed purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Sound insulation test image is completely misleading. I also ...
customer_reviews.text: Sound insulation test image is completely misleading. I also attached image on that 100% blackout. I am surprised at such high rating... I paid extra vs other products, because I figured this would do both but didn't.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Elegant privacy
customer_reviews.text: I love the sheen; the bright white color; the brushed nickel grommets which match all of my new bathroom fixtures; and the white backing/lining which provides privacy in my bathroom. I needed an updated window treatment for my renovated bathroom that gives us privacy and wouldn’t compete with our new mosaic tile. I got the packing wrinkles out by tossing them in the dryer with a damp white wash cloth on the gentle cycle. Be aware, these curtains are not 100% blackout for people needing complete darkness in the daytime, but they are opaque enough so that nobody can see inside. I absolutely love them.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Turning Day into Night
customer_reviews.text: I work overnight half of the year and was looking for something to turn my day into night. These curtains are amazing. They hang a little long, but the dragging keeps light out too. As you can see from my pictures, they work great. These were taken at 1:00pm, when I woke up. I had to open the bathroom door a pinch to get the camera sensor to even work. I love these shades! I bought the Navy Blue. It's almost a dark grey/blue rather than navy, but I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough about these buy them
customer_reviews.text: If you're on the fence about getting these get them. this is the best money I have ever spent. I have 6 forward facing windows in my house and when the 5pm Florida sun shines directly at my house for 1 hour I know what hell feels like. no amount of air conditioning in the world can help the direct sunlight beaming through turning my living room into an oven. these curtains not only blackout 100% of the light they block out the heat and the sound. I have bought blackout curtains before from Walmart they did nothing! these are amazing and I will buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Octavia Perdomo

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Blackout!
customer_reviews.text: These are everything they're advertised to be. They completely block light, they're heavy and hang well, and they're not bad looking. They should totally solve the problem of summer sun coming through my french doors and baking my bedroom. Also these block the light from porch lights of my neighbors at night. Be sure to buy enough panels to have them hang in folds and eliminate any gaps between panels. I bought 3 sets of panels (6 panels total) to cover a 96" wide window.
customer_reviews.author: Dorcas

customer_reviews.title: Great curtains
customer_reviews.text: They are 63 inches made well but not 100 % black out! I am using them in a room that faces EAST and the sun shines in heavy all day..Florida. Bought them used them last night. Blocked out street lights that glared in ,100% But morning was darkish not black and no sun came in at all...guess it's like dark dusk before total nightfall I do love the curtains..they are better then any blinds you can buy and most curtains! Love them! I get migraines so....thank God for them
customer_reviews.author: leahsnotes

customer_reviews.title: Total Blackout!  Finally!
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are perfect. Perfect plum color and totally black out. I bought them for both my daughter's rooms and now for the guest room and to divide the archway from the bedroom to the bathroom so I don't get woken up by my husband getting ready in the morning. Amazing for the price. Material is decent. Not too heavy, not too light. A light sheen to the fabric in both grey and plum. Not a decadent looking fancy curtain but simple, elegant, great for the price and totally blackout like they advertise. I've ordered and returned quite a few curtains because they don't block the light as promised. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: White is not white
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are really good for for blocking the light. I would 100% recommend them for that reason. The reason I took off a star is because the white still has a black backing. So I can see the black sometimes which I don’t like. Also, because there is black behind the white panel, it looks more silver/gray than white. So i would not recommend if they are going against white walls. But other than the color issue, they are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: 100% blackout and very beautiful! High quality material
customer_reviews.text: So beautiful and EXACTLY as pictured! I was worried the color wouldn’t be the same as the picture but it is EXACT and so so beautiful! Also, is is truly 100% black out. Absolutely zero light penetrates through the actual curtain, I have attached a few pictures. One of the panels arrived with a small stain and both smelled pretty bad.. so I threw them in the washer and dryer (as directed by label) and they came out fresh and clean. If it hadn’t been for that I would have rated 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Good quality slightly shiny curtain.
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are well-made and I didn’t have any issues with them. They were true to size. They are double layered with white on the back and let through very little light at all. They stop all glare when we’re having television time. They have a satin sheen to them. The wrinkles are not hard to get out with a steamer but I still have to remove some wrinkles. They kissed the floor nicely at a 96Inch long thighs. They are definitely a bright white. I think the only reason I did not give them a five star is because the sheen is a little harsh and shows the slightest imperfection in any seams or wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: P. Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: True blackout curtains!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best blackout curtains EVER. They really are true blackout. I’ve had bad luck in the past with “blackout” curtains that were actually room darkening, but these are the real deal. They make the room almost pitch black. I bought a second pair for our second bedroom! They’re perfect for kids and babies to keep them sleeping longer ;) Color: as other reviews have mentioned, the white is more of a light light grey. I had ordered the khaki color for the second bedroom, but it looked nothing like the picture. It was darker, uglier, and like a shiny satin. I returned it for another “white” (light gre
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Keep sending the wrong product!
customer_reviews.text: I am so frustrated! Ive ordered this curtain 3 times. I ordered two pairs, first pair- great, love it. Second pair were the right length but were not blackout like the first pair even though the package said it was. Ok, I return it order again. This time the curtain was not 108 inches even though the package said it was. Fine. Return it. Order again- and now the curtain is even shorter! Not 108 inches. See the pic...pair on right perfect. Pair on left- supposed to be the same and its not! So now I have to return both I suppose!
customer_reviews.author: JenL

customer_reviews.title: Not total black out BUT
customer_reviews.text: Compared to what I have before and the fact that there is a small rectangular window atop the window where no blinds can go, this does the trick just fine! I just installed them today around 3:30, room faces North so always sunny, and I can literally go to sleep now and not wake up until tomorrow. Honestly, if it wasn't for that extra window up top it would be completely dark. I can't speak about the noise canceling because, outside of the shooting range, my neighborhood isn't noisy. I'll update about the noise over the weekend because that's when people really use the shooting range.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: True Black Out curtains!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I don’t normally write product reviews unless I feel strongly about a product. These black out curtains are thick and do a really nice job of blocking out light and providing privacy. The material is shiny and they look nice. They have a few wrinkles but I’m sure my hand held steamer would do the trick! I do wish that they came in more stylish colors/patterns. The grey I purchase is more of like a dark silvery color just FYI. I really like them though. If you’re hesitating on purchasing don’t. They will make your room nice and dark! 😄
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful material, great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Wow these really are beautiful! Great blackout ability, too. Was also being realistic with what to expect from the ‘noise cancellation’. One of my bedroom windows faces my neighbors driveway and his car is LOUD when he leaves for work at 6a. Ugh. These curtains really lowered the noise. Still hear it but surprisingly reduced that it’s not so bothersome. Definitely great purchase and I’m buying 2 more sets for my living room! Thank you SO much!
customer_reviews.author: PrimeQueenT

customer_reviews.title: The perfect curtains for Alaskan summers!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you live in Alaska, these are the curtains to buy! We bought “blackout” curtains from Ikea, and they weren’t blackout, so my summer has consisted of a greenhouse/sauna master bedroom, with approximately 20 hours of daylight. While the fact that they look like silk isn’t the most appealing to me, THEY ACTUALLY WORK!!! The blue is a very pretty shade, and they keep the room nice and dark. I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Uneven Panels
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the fabric is good and it matches perfectly with our decor. However, as you can see in the photo, one of the panels is completely ruined by the fact that the "blackout" lining is longer than the grey material and sticks out like a sore thumb. This completely ruins the look and, since my Husband accidentally threw out the packaging, I cannot even return it. Likely will not be buying again from this Vendor again
customer_reviews.author: Kamal Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Feels like nighttime all the time!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because there's a window behind my couch which causes a glare on my TV. These curtains were easy to install on my existing curtain rod and the double layer makes the blackout unbelievable. It's so dark in my room now that it's dangerous because I can't wake up with the sunlight anymore! I don't think it helps a whole lot with noise cancellation, but it does seem to help regulate the temperature from the window. I would definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Louie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent black out curtains.
customer_reviews.text: These exceeded my expectations. My daughter's room gets a good amount of light all day long and I wanted something to help with naps. These bad boys will have you questioning what time of day it is because they really do block the light. I purchased ones close to the size of the window, but if you really want a pitch black room, plan to hang these as high as possible and choose the length that will come to the floor. They aren't nearly as heavy as I expected and the material is nice. I probably should have ironed them before hanging, but the wrinkles will probably fall out on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Darweesh

customer_reviews.title: Smells of Stinkbugs
customer_reviews.text: This was a reorder of the same set I bought in May of 2017. This set is lighter weight and I can see light through them when the light is bright. On top of that, they smelled strongly of stinkbugs when I opened them. I can't say 100% that it was indeed stinkbugs and not some chemical, but either way it was awful smelling. Very dissapointed. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ugly but truly blackout
customer_reviews.text: These do the job. I got them in grey, they weren’t uneven nor badly sewn as other reviewers stated (maybe other colors are?). They are ugly, shiny nylon sateen material, but are truly blackout, one side gray, underside black. I held my phone light behind the fabric and there was zero light coming through. They aren’t heavy, I hangythem from a tension rod (for windows not for bathroom curtains) and both work well. Mine are hidden during the day in the frame between window and hacienda blinds, so the ugliness isn’t an issue as they cannot be seen. As the hacienda blinds cannot block the light, these curtains certainly do.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: They look nothing like the picture... NOTHING AT ALL! I wish I had not bought them! They are greyish blue, not bright white and the lining is... GREY. I need a bright white especially since my room is a warm tone and... greyish blue does not work. The stitching is terrible and puckers. I can't get that out no matter what I do, so they look extremely wrinkled. YUCK! They're just awful! This is the second set of curtains I have bought from Amazon for my bedroom, and... I'M SO OVER THIS RIGHT NOW!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Price

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR PROJECTORS
customer_reviews.text: I first got these blackout curtains from Walmart and they said 100% and then I put them up and they definitely were not so I thought why not look on here and I read some reviews it said they were good I tried them out and I do not regret it they are perfect I do have a projector in my room and making it totally black out during the day makes it easier to watch TV makes it easier to play video games makes it easier to watch DVDs it is absolutely amazing
customer_reviews.author: Ash Wag

customer_reviews.title: These curtains!
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are A-M-A-Z-I-N-G! I just moved into an apartment and only have 2 windows. I can hear the a/c units outside, dogs barking, people coughing outside etc. I got these to help block out the morning sun and the noise. I was iffy about these because of the price but HONEY! the room is PITCH BLACK when these are closed! I have the gray set and am about to purchase the white set for my bedroom. It blocks out every speck of sun, street light, etc...You will not be disappointed! Trust me!
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: I love them. They darken the room, they block noise, they hang nicely. The only issue i have with them is the grommets. They don’t slide well at all. I’m thinking about spraying WD 40 on the rod while removing the panels, as not to get them dirty. And maybe that will help. They are white with a gray tint like most others said. But that is what i wanted. That’s due to the room darkening (white) panel on the back. Great price. They were 1/3 of the price of the panels i purchased for my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: True blackout, but very wrinkly
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered a lot of "blackout" curtains recently (and had to send some back as they we not blackout). But these are the real deal. No light gets through these panels at all! The only light, as seen in the picture, comes around the top and edges, which can be dealt with (eg, by using a valance, proper positioning). My only complaint is that these (2 different sets) arrived VERY wrinkly. I got these to deal with a concussion and was not about to wash and dry these before hanging. So they're hanging a bit unevenly due to the heavy wrinkling. Otherwise, the quality is nice.
customer_reviews.author: LeonaG

customer_reviews.title: Now these are what I call BLACKOUT curtains!
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal. I bought and returned so many from Kohl's, Bed Bath and Beyond, TJ Maxx, all that were supposedly BLACKOUT but were far from it. I was a little skeptical about these since they're online and it's either a hit or miss. But I was not disappointed at all. The length was perfect, since my window was huge and I needed long curtains. I also reviewed these in my YouTube video and you can clearly see the difference between the department store curtains I had versus these. Definitely recommended!
customer_reviews.author: ForeverMicaia

customer_reviews.title: my room is pitch black!
customer_reviews.text: I work nights so sleep during the day is important. I previously had eclipse blackout curtains and o had no idea what I was missing. I honestly didn’t think there were curtains on the market that actually did like they said. These are Amazing! we have 5 Bay windows in our bedroom and the sun beats through them every morning! I picked the white color curtains and they work so well! first picture was taken late afternoon. the second picture with the curtains closed was taken at 11 am with the sun beating in!
customer_reviews.author: JohnnyG.Hernandez1021

customer_reviews.title: The Absolute Best in blackout and price!
customer_reviews.text: I received these blackout curtains a couple of weeks ago. I ordered the white. They actually look like a gray white. Which I dont mind because I have gray /white living room. The fabric has a slight sheen that makes them look high end. They have a black liner on the back of each panel, so they are absolutely blackout panels.I love these panels. I so happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: busybee406

customer_reviews.title: Really nice & about Flamingo color
customer_reviews.text: These are lightweight panels with a thin black polyester lining panel. Great if you have to use tension rods because you can hang a few on one rod without too much weight. They block the light just great but seem a bit thin for noise reducing much. They have a bit of a sheen to them, a smooth polyester almost satin but not quite that shiny. The flamingo color is exactly the color of a red anthurium flower both in the shadows and light in the folds of the curtains as you would see in the light and dark shades on an anthurium flower. Painters eye here- I really like these.
customer_reviews.author: judith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality curtains but the white does have a gray tint.
customer_reviews.text: These really work great to blackout a room, it makes day look like night. :-) These are not pure white tho if that's what your looking for, they have a gray tint to them from the black behind showing thru making them appear more of a light gray. If you don't mind that they are very nice quality curtains. I would not recommend tho if your looking to match white or if light gray will not go with your room, then I'd suggest looking for a different color.
customer_reviews.author: A🦋

customer_reviews.title: A\ nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The item has a satin look to them. They definitely help with the sun, but they are not completely black out curtains. I noticed from reviews that others have complained about the length of the curtain not being the same from one side to the other, and I also have noticed this. It is not something drastic that I would return the item for, but if they were more expensive, I probably would. For the price, they are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn G

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic curtains for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for shades that would black out our master bedroom and after reading reviews and evaluating the options purchased these. Honestly I was not expecting much for the price but was very, very pleasantly surprised at the quality of these shades. They are silky soft on the outside and have a black liner on the interior side and worked like a charm. Total blackout and adding sleep to my early mornings. These are simply high quality and very efficient. Needless to say, shipped on Prime and got them in one day!
customer_reviews.author: mkpi

customer_reviews.title: Block light and some sound
customer_reviews.text: I got the wheat color and the curtains themselves block the light well. Light can come in around the curtains and through the grommets at the top. If you need total blackout then make sure you hang them high enough that the light doesn't reach the grommets and wide enough that it doesn't come in around the sides. I live on a hill above a freeway and can hear cars. The curtains dampen the sound some but certainly don't block it.
customer_reviews.author: Zach's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Legit 100% black out.
customer_reviews.text: Holy moly this has made my sleep hygiene so much better. Chances are your current curtains are trash, so throw them away and get these. Seriously. Do yourself a damn favor. They’re 100% black out. As in, my room is PITCH black during the day with these closed. My mom bought other ‘black out’ curtains from JC penny but when I looked at them they were trash, like your current curtains. So don’t waste your time. Buy these and sleep well.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: 100% blackout!! Great Curtains
customer_reviews.text: It blacks out light like it said it does, the picture I took adds more brightness than what is really there, it brings perfect darkness in the room during daylight. Very soft and beautiful material. I don’t know how the white on back curtains work, but these are the plum with black on back and work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great curtains!
customer_reviews.text: Straightforward, blackout blinds. Material is heavy and feels like high quality but it’s also lightweight. But this is true blackout. I bought these to replace other curtains that were supposedly blackout but were actually room darkening. These are great for keeping the room very dark. The only thing I’m worried about is the rings rusting when I wash them. I guess I’ll find out.
customer_reviews.author: S. M.

customer_reviews.title: Thick and truly blackout - though color is off
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are thick and great at keeping the light out (other than what peeks through the top if you don't have a cap on your windows. They've been great for keeping our room a bit cooler this summer as well. The only issue I have with them is that the white pair I ordered are really more of a light gray color which is unfortunate when we wanted a true white curtain.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Moulden

customer_reviews.title: Total Max Blackout!
customer_reviews.text: I live in Houston and Spring/Summer starts much earlier in Texas compared to other states. I just moved into a new upstairs apartment and in the afternoon the sun is directly on my patio and makes my living room very hot. Since I put up these blackout curtains, my living stays cool during the day. These curtains will definitely help with electricity bill this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Erinn

customer_reviews.title: Would buy these 100 times out of 100!
customer_reviews.text: does a great job of keeping my room pitch black and my room does seem cooler, i would say pay the extra money for this brand because the quality is outstanding, it could be 3 o'clock in the afternoon but it would look 99 percent dark in my room because of these curtains, buy these if you want a cooler feeling room and total blackout!
customer_reviews.author: NICK

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye to my sleep mask!
customer_reviews.text: We got these curtains to help with heat during the southern summer. I cannot speak to that yet since it's still in the 70s here, but if you are going for darkness in your room...this is PERFECT. I usually HAVE to sleep with a mask but did not need to after my husband installed these. I actually took a nap in the middle of the day and the room looked it was middle of the night!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen H. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great Curtains!
customer_reviews.text: Using these curtains in our living room to help block out the heat that radiates in from our east facing windows. The room stays much more comfortable now. I can't fully attest to their darkening abilities much (I have a small semi-circular window above my main window that lets light in), but they did decrease the amount of light coming in the other windows substantially. I would 100% recommend these curtains to help with heat and believe they would significantly decrease light coming in to a bedroom, especially if one had room darkening blinds behind them.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking.
customer_reviews.text: These definitely darken but we’re not true black out. Purchased to swap out our nice curtains for the sale of our home. They did look great. If you need true blackout these are not for you, if you like your room very dark at night but can still see during the day when closed, these are great. Material kinda reminded me of vinyl.
customer_reviews.author: K. Green

customer_reviews.title: pretty balckout curtains
customer_reviews.text: We needed these for our bedroom in the summer time. The Florida heat really builds up through the sliding glass doors. These curtains are two layers. The white inside layer has a silky feel and is attractive, the black liner really does the job of blacking out the room and keeping it cool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for blackout
customer_reviews.text: I love that they are actually blackout curtains as opposed to many that claim to be. The difference is the black panel on the back side. Otherwise it wouldn’t work at all as I’ve found with other brands. My only gripe is the white color was too far from winter white or ivory. Still kind of a bluish grey tinge, not a soft white as I had expected.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Slabbinck

customer_reviews.title: You’ll need to order 3 panels if you are trying to span a 100” window.
customer_reviews.text: they are 52” in width stretched out but when you put them on a rod they are really 40” in width... :( will have to return everything.
customer_reviews.author: Eric F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Hang well. Keeps out all the light.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. We put it up past the window frame and higher. No light comes through but during the day we pull them back and they pleat perfectly just past our beautiful window casings and molding. We didn’t want them to be covered. I had been looking for some that were dark color on one side and white on the other to match the inside and outside of the house. Really hard to find until now.
customer_reviews.author: NanaB

customer_reviews.title: Great for blocking out light
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my baby boys nursery! Now that its summer time it's harder to put him down. After buying these he thinks its bed time right on time again! They block out tons of light. I had to iron them before putting them up but that's pretty common when buying curtains. The grey color is perfect just as shown. Good quality for the price as well. No cons.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla D. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Black background is best
customer_reviews.text: Most recently I purchased the white with white on back and it is considerably different than the white with the black background. The double white is heavyweight and good-looking but it only blocks about 75-80% of the light. I loved and recommend anything with the black background.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B

customer_reviews.title: High quality drapes at an excellent price point
customer_reviews.text: These drapes are beautiful, heavy, look and feel silky. These are blackout curtains provided you hang them correctly. I live in a 100+ year old house with original windows. These drapes keep the draft out and the room is noticeably warmer. Excellent product at an excellent price point.
customer_reviews.author: Anni

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Blackout Curtians
customer_reviews.text: Living in New York City, the sky is consistantly lit up. All that light reflects into your room and, honestly I didn't realize this, despite how dim it is, can effect how deep you sleep! The first night I installed these curtains, my room became pitch black. I fell asleep so quickly it surprised me. Not only that, I slept deeper. I also noticed that it stopped the draft that was seeping through the window, so my room stayed warm. I honestly highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Worth the $
customer_reviews.text: As a night shift worker these are a MUST! Or even for those that want to sleep in on the weekend or dont want prying eyes through their windows
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Colors changed
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know what to expect but these curtains came on time and worked well for my home. Needed a gentle ironing out of the pack but that was to be expected. I would order again. Update September 2020: my previous review was 4* in 2018. Just did a reorder of the exact same color(wheat) and length....disappointed that the colors don’t match. The wheat color from 2018 is lighter-more yellowish than the wheat color I received with this order. Changing rating to 2* due to the color change.
customer_reviews.author: Char Den

customer_reviews.title: Darkens the and cools the room
customer_reviews.text: This curtain has a 100% blackout effect to it. A little light seeps through the top and bottom, but I expected it to happen, nothing's perfect. My room used to get so much sunlight in the afternoon, and it got hot in there (the old curtains just weren't cutting it). This has noticeably cooled the room, and my AC doesn't have to work as hard. These curtains are perfect if you are a night time worker or if you need to block the sunlight from heating the room.
customer_reviews.author: Nocturnal X

customer_reviews.title: Blackout!!
customer_reviews.text: These are no joke. They make your room black. No light gets through at all. I don’t know about the noise. I haven’t really noticed it blocking any but I live in a pretty quiet area. My only complaint is that they look like cheap fabric. But that was easily resolved with a double curtain rod and pretty sheers in front.
customer_reviews.author: tracys

customer_reviews.title: Black lining causes curtains to have a grey tint
customer_reviews.text: They are silkier than I thought. Also the black backing/lining causes the white fabric to have a grey tint to it. I returned this item and got curtains with the White lining instead
customer_reviews.author: JASON DOWDY

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love these!! They completely eliminate all light from our sliding glass doors! They totally block out the heat too since it faces the sunrise! I definitely notice a temp difference in the house! The material is nice as well. Will post pics when Amazon starts allowing them again
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Beebe

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 100% blackout curtains to sleep during the day for work overnight. In combination with my pull down shades, they are 100% blackout. With the shades up, they still let a little light in. There were a few small areas on the curtains that were a little dirty with black smudges. I was able to get them out with dawn dishwashing liquid and hot water. Wrinkles were easy to get out with a steamer. They are thick, good quality, hang nicely, seams are even, and no frays. Overall, I am happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: perfect blackout curtains
customer_reviews.text: These curtains are perfect for those who like to have ZERO light coming through the windows. Some curtains say they are black out, but once the sun hits them they still show some light - these are perfect and are of great quality as well. Some light will come through in the loops at the top, but hang it high enough and it will be pitch black in your bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I love these curtains on our sliding glass door to keep out the hot sun in summer, and cold in winter. They really are blackout curtains and made of good quality. Perfect fit, and easy to install. Not sure if they will fade from sun. The price was good.
customer_reviews.author: PG

customer_reviews.title: Ugly blackout curtains that actually work
customer_reviews.text: Very ugly curtain. It’s a terrible quality and style. But it does the job and it’s cheap so we are using it but makes the room ugly.
customer_reviews.author: Talia

customer_reviews.title: White blackout curtains that actually work
customer_reviews.text: We have had blackout curtains in the past but they were always black. We recently repainted our rooms and wanted new curtains and saw these. My husband didn’t believe they could be white and still blackout. It blocks 90-95% of the light, it’s only at the top and bottom and that could be the rod I’m using holding it to far away from the window. I’ve also noticed the rooms stay warmer with these curtains so they are helping insulate as well. Some reviewers said they look gray because of the black inside liner, but to me they look white.
customer_reviews.author: Karla Lawhorn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful curtains
customer_reviews.text: They're excellent in blocking light. Where I live, there's no outside noise, so I can't attest to that feature. The material is layered, and the outer is a silky type, which means they're (even-though packaged well) are wrinkled from the get-go. I bought 3 sets for my master bedroom, and love them!
customer_reviews.author: Marly

customer_reviews.title: Great blackout curtains.
customer_reviews.text: Great blackout curtains. Really does block light out. Not really noise cancellation. Order white but it wasn't really white more like white with a grayish tint. I wanted it to be pure white and wished the fabric was a bit more better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Shylin

customer_reviews.title: Blackout
customer_reviews.text: They are good quality curtains and they truly do black out the light. And with the sun beating in my back door every morning these are super nice to have. Not only is it cooler but also with the sunlight kept out my kids sleep longer because the sun isn’t beating in their rooms! Love these curtains. Going to buy more for my master bedroom French doors.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal De Santiago

customer_reviews.title: White on white
customer_reviews.text: The whit with white backing is NOT blackout. Disappointed. Picture is of this curtain on the left and the amazon blackout panel on the right. I was thinking of switching to these because I like the material more but finding out they’re not completely black out ruined it for me.
customer_reviews.author: ELC

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t like the material and look
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning the curtains because I didn’t like the material and the look. It has a shiny and silky Look.
customer_reviews.author: AD Shocker

customer_reviews.title: The curtains look nice, but the measurements are inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: The curtains look nice, but the measurements are inaccurate. They were way too small for our windows, when it should have been perfect. It's too bad I have to return them, because they are complete blackout curtains and look decent. But way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Angulo

customer_reviews.title: Good length and they feel like they're made well
customer_reviews.text: Good length and they feel like they're made well. However they are shiny which I did not realize from the description/photos.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Finally got these up and for the money I am pleased. They're reasonably priced without appearing cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy white!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely doesn’t block out light also if you purchase white, it’s not, it’s light gray! Should have sent them back......ordered 2 sets & they were inches off in length!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money if you are looking for a dark ...
customer_reviews.text: These aren't really blackout...the do dim the sun from coming in but there was still a lot of sun coming through. Don't waste your money if you are looking for a dark room.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Peters

customer_reviews.title: They BLOCK THE LIGHT RIGHT
customer_reviews.text: OMG these are amazing! They definitely block out the light - I have 3 across a short long window and I can finally sleep without the garage lights and porch lights from outside blarring in! Only 4 stars though because when they hang, some of them aren't straight which drives me crazy. But the price is right so whatdya gonna do? During the day they're scrunched up to let the light in so I never notice so NBD.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: No care in strucktions
customer_reviews.text: Curtains were very wrinkled right out of the package and my mom wanted to ether throw them in the dryer or steam the to get the wrinkles out. Plus we have dog that like to sit up in the window and watch people go by which get fur all over the curtains. We look in the packaging and on the curtains themselves no care instructions anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: J. Vigil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Blackout Curtains
customer_reviews.text: I bought a set for my sons room that gets strong daylight all day long. The curtains keep out the sun, which keeps the room so much cooler. My son loves that his room is super dark in the day. He love napping in the dark. I think there may be some sound proofing as well. My other son had to have some for his room, so of course had to repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M. Majors

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for night shifters!
customer_reviews.text: We got the grey pair about 6 months ago because we work night shifts and needed to black out the sun as it sones almost directly into our window. I couldn’t be happier. We’ve tried 2 other sets before this one and they’re nothing in comparison. These work wonders!
customer_reviews.author: Kayli H

customer_reviews.title: Great product! You are an Amazon Best Seller!  I am impressed with product quality!
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with product quality, reusable packaging zippered bags and fast shipping!! I purchased (4) sets of the 100 x 84 for my patio doors and double-wide windows as well as (1) set of the 52 x 84 for a single window. Truly 100% blackout double layer quality lined material true to color as advertised. The Amazon Prime sign on your product page and prior customer reviews helped influence my buying decision – You are a best seller! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: HappyCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Truly are blackout curtains even in white, my husband ...
customer_reviews.text: Truly are blackout curtains even in white, my husband is on night shift so he need them for sleep and work really well! Well enough I have to remember to open them before I go to bed so I can see daylight when I wake up or I get disoriented and don’t realize it’s morning! lol They do have creases from being folded up into packaging even after being hung for a few weeks but I honestly haven’t tried to get them out since they don’t bother me much.
customer_reviews.author: heatherfeather

customer_reviews.title: Great blackout curtains!
customer_reviews.text: These curtains work great and look nice. They keep the cold out, the light out and the noise. I highly recommend them :-)
customer_reviews.author: D. Adriance

customer_reviews.title: Blocks out annoying sunlight!
customer_reviews.text: These drapes are just what I needed. The quality is great and it does the job of blocking out annoying sunlight. I have it in white to match my walls, and it looks great. I might buy another set here soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not white
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT white. Due to the black backing they’re more of an off white/ grayish color. If you’re looking for pure white blackouts go with curtains that have a bright white backing. These definitely made the room dark and awesome for the price. I ended up returning them for bright white ones.
customer_reviews.author: BadBunny

customer_reviews.title: Actually blackout!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the amount of light these could block being white, but the back liner is black and they do a great job! I don't think they block sound at all but I wanted them for the light!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for 82 × 84 inches windows and it looks like it needs to be wider so if you want ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for 82 × 84 inches windows and it looks like it needs to be wider so if you want to cover the entire window, buy the wider one. Otherwise the material lioks and feel great! My husband thinks its "eligant". Im very pleased with it. I suggest put it in the dryer before hanging to release the wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: M.K.

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be heavier
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, was expecting the curtain to be a lot heavier. Just put up so not sure about noise. I purchased to help block heat or cold
customer_reviews.author: Keith Engie

customer_reviews.title: exactly as advertised. length and width right on. ...
customer_reviews.text: exactly as advertised. length and width right on. room is dark in the morning. we live in arizona and have sun screens on all windows but our bedroom window because it does not normally get direct sunlight but even the indirect sun is strong this time of the year when the outside temp is around 105 to 110. the lining blocks this sunlight and heat from entering the room.
customer_reviews.author: jack morrell

customer_reviews.title: These have a slight sheen
customer_reviews.text: These totally get the job done! My room is pitch black. I was a little disappointed that they have a slight sheen I thought I bought these same ones before but they had a sueded finish. I kept these because I was just anxious to get them hung. The quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Total Darkness for the Baby’s Room
customer_reviews.text: These blackout curtains are amazing. They are super soft and silky and the color does not look black but light grey. Most important they block out the sun coming through the windows. I think if I hung the rod a little higher I could achieve total darkness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Double Layer 100% Blackout Short Curtains for Bedroom Thermal Insulated Lined Curtains for Small Window | Full Light Blocking Energy Saving Grommet Drapes Draperies 45" Long, 2 Panels, Grey
feature_bullets: 100% BLACKOUT: Innovated with high technology on real blackout feature, these magic window curtain draperies can completely block out 100% SUNLIGHT and UV RAY, provide an entire dark environment, great choice for any room you would like to turn day into night

DOUBLE LAYER: Crafted from luxury material, front side is silk feeling duchesse fabric, backed with soft, thick, smooth natural woven blackout fabric (no chemical coating), lined construction, ECO friendly and Environmental, add decent home styles to your place

ULTIMATE FUNCTIONS: The extra wide blackout curtain is not only with beautiful looking, but functional on soundproof, thermal insulated, energy efficient. Widely use for bedroom, patio door, home theater, family room, living room for definitely darkening

WELL MADE: Sold per pair, include two(2) full blackout curtain panels. Each panel measures W52" x L45". Set measures W104"x L45". Each panel has 8 grommets on curtain top which fit up to 1 1/4 inches curtain rods for easy installation and sliding

EASY CARE: Machine washable for easy care, use only non-chlorine bleach when needed. Tumble dry low and warm iron as needed. You are welcome to shopping more styles of other home décor products in Flamingo P shop
